name: fpf-swe-discipline-skillpack
description: SWE reasoning discipline built on Anatoly Levenchuk's First Principles Framework. Skills for hypothesis-based reasoning, confidence tracking, weakest-link analysis, and more.

plugins.name: fpf-swe-discipline
plugins.description: SWE reasoning discipline built on Anatoly Levenchuk's First Principles Framework (github.com/ailev/FPF). Includes hypothesis-based reasoning, confidence/scope tracking, weakest-link analysis, plan-vs-reality checks, and bounded context translation.
